imdb.plot outline: Popular girl and cheerleader, Mallory, finally becomes fed up with school bully, Jake, when she witnesses him trying to pull new girl, Kayla, into a back alley. Sick of his tyrannical hold on the school, Mallory embraces an unlikely group of friends to finally expose Jake's bullying and get him dealt with, once and for all.
imdb.title: A Day in the Life
akas: A Day in the Life (United States)
plot: Cheerleader versus school bully in a battle of wits. Who will win?::Kathy Smith

Popular girl and cheerleader, Mallory, finally becomes fed up with school bully, Jake, when she witnesses him trying to pull new girl, Kayla, into a back alley. Sick of his tyrannical hold on the school, Mallory embraces an unlikely group of friends to finally expose Jake's bullying and get him dealt with, once and for all.::Kathy Smith
